history.proof: intros. split. - intros H1. pose proof (H (prodp e H1)) as H2. qsimpl time: 2 use: provable_impp_refl. - intros H1. specialize (H H1). qsimpl time: 2 use: provable_impp_refl.

exceptions.tactic: pose proof (H (prodp e x)) as H2.
exceptions.exn: The reference x was not found in the current environment.

ctx: pose proof (H (prodp e H1)) as H2.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall x : expr, |-- x --> x" on hypothesis of type "expr".

ctx: pose proof (H (prodp e H1)) as H2.
exceptions.exn: No such goal. Focus next goal with bullet -.

ctx: pose proof (H (prodp e H1)) as H2.
exceptions.exn: The reference x was not found in the current environment.

ctx: pose proof (H (prodp e H1)) as H2.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "expr" on hypothesis of type "|-- prodp e H1 <--> H1".

ctx: pose proof (H (prodp e H1)) as H2.

original: intros e prodp H x. split. - intros H1. pose proof (H (prodp e x)) as H2. apply provable_impp_refl in H1. specialize (H2 H1). apply H2. - intros H1. specialize (H x). apply H1 in H. apply H.
